Interface RequestDefaults

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasHeaders
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface RequestDefaults
extends HasHeaders

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Auth getAuth()

      Resets all defaults (mediaType, auth, timeout and headers).

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets all defaults (mediaType, auth, timeout and headers).

      • setMediaType

        void setMediaType(String mediaType)
        Sets a default media-type to be applied in all requests as Content-Type and Accept headers.
        Parameters:
        mediaType - The media-type to be set by default in all requests
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If media-type string is malformed

      • getMediaType

        String getMediaType()
        Get the default media-type that is being applied in all requests as Content-Type and Accept headers.
